meaningMnemonic: There is an <radical>animal</radical> in the <radical>grass</radical> and your horrible <radical>task</radical> is to go <kanji>hunting</kanji> for it.
readingMnemonic: You're currently <kanji>hunting</kanji> in a <reading>row</reading> (りょう) boat and you have to row as quietly and carefully as you can or the animal will run away.
